title: Warlock
content:
nts at 1st Level: 8 + Constitution modifier Hit Points at Higher Levels: 5 + Constitution modifier

Armour: Light Armour Weapons: Simple Weapon Saving Throws: Wisdom, Charisma Skills: Choose any 2 Skills from - Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, Religion

STARTING EQUIPMENT

Padded Armor, Simple Boots Dagger Health Potion x2, Scroll of Revivify

Full Spellcasters: Unlocks new spell level every 2 Warlock levels, up to level 6 spells. Cantrips: Starts with 2 Cantrips
